alert.note: Alert for Western Grant (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 8:03PM EST until January 07 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle is expected this evening, potentially leading to a glaze of ice. Snow showers are expected late tonight through tomorrow evening, leading to accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett County. In West Virginia, Western Grant County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
